actionable_tasks.title: Frontend UI Completion: Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Implement and finalize the Spotify OAuth authentication flow in the frontend, ensuring users can securely log in and authorize the app to access their playlists.
implementation_steps: Review existing Spotify OAuth logic and UI components.
Add missing UI elements for login and error handling.
Test the authentication flow end-to-end with a test Spotify account.
Update documentation to reflect the completed interface.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase the number of automated tests for critical backend endpoints, focusing on provider switching and telemetry metrics to ensure reliability.
implementation_steps: Identify endpoints with low test coverage using existing test reports.
Write additional unit and integration tests for provider switching and telemetry.
Run tests and verify coverage improvements.
Update test documentation.

actionable_tasks.title: Docker Optimization: Multi-Stage Builds
actionable_tasks.description: Optimize Dockerfiles for backend and frontend services by implementing multi-stage builds to reduce image size and improve build caching.
implementation_steps: Refactor Dockerfiles to use multi-stage builds (build, test, production).
Test build process locally and verify reduced image size.
Update docker-compose.yml for development and production environments.
Document changes in deployment README.

actionable_tasks.title: Backend: Add MongoDB TTL Index for Telemetry Data
actionable_tasks.description: Implement a TTL (Time-To-Live) index on the telemetry collection in MongoDB to automatically expire old data and optimize storage.
implementation_steps: Update telemetry model to include a timestamp field.
Add TTL index creation logic to database initialization script.
Test index creation and data expiration locally.
Document the TTL index in backend setup instructions.

actionable_tasks.title: Backend: Add Request Correlation IDs for Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach unique correlation IDs to incoming requests in the backend to enable end-to-end tracing and easier debugging.
implementation_steps: Create middleware to generate and attach correlation IDs to requests.
Update logging to include correlation IDs.
Test tracing across multiple endpoints.
Document tracing setup for developers.
